about_the_game:
This game follows the story of a sentient cube lost within a mysterious facility.

The Game

The main scene behind this game resembles a flappy bird spin-off in a robotic environment, devoid of any biological life. This game also includes various other features, such as:
  • Mana Orb Collection [in-game currency]
  • Smart obstacles
  • Enemies & bosses
  • Unlockable upgrades & skins

What else?

This game also hides various puzzles and secrets within itself. Use tools available to you to learn more about this facility you've been trapped in. Discover other simulated experiences left behind by previous employees, investigate old information packages, and much more!

This game is a recreation of a previous game made by us, which is no longer available to download.

name: Flappiper: Remade
short_description: Lost in some mysterious facility, avoid obstacles in a parody of Flappy Bird. Purchase upgrades, equip skins, survive encounters all in order to investigate the questionable decisions behind a monopolized corporation.
